channel.title: Unholy grail developing team
channel.description:
you are probably thinking :confused: what is unholy grail
[b][u]explanation[/u][/b] unholy grail is a java based fantasy mmorpg game
[b][u]application format[/u][/b] position- age- experience examples other info Skype?
positions needed are developers, web developer, tester hoster and assistant modeler
thanks, nessie. Skype: nessie.rsps1
